Articles.Content: I don't know if this is supposed to happen but my pods keep sinking in the ocean after splashing down. Perhaps it's part of the buoyancy update in 1.0.5. It doesn't do any harm and everything is recoverable but maybe I need a radial flotation device? It seems to happen to only my modded pods but I haven't done extensive testing. Anyone have any ideas or input?
Mods that aren't updated for 1.0.5 will...presumably need to be updated for 1.0.5. :)
:sticktongue:Well it was my FASA mod. Lol I think you are in control of that.
